title: Karin Fossum Bibliography (US Retail ePub)
description:
Karin Fossum made her literary debut in Norway with a collection of poetry in 1974. She has since published another volume of poetry, two collections of short stories and one non-crime novel. Her crime novels featuring Inspector Konrad Sejer are published in sixteen languages. She lives in Oslo.

Inspector Sejer
1. Eva's Eye (2012)
2. Don't Look Back (2002)
3. He Who Fears the Wolf (2003)
4. When the Devil Holds the Candle (2004)
5. The Indian Bride (2005)
6. Black Seconds (2007)
7. The Water's Edge (2009)
8. Bad Intentions (2010)
9. The Caller (2011)
 
Novels
Broken (2008)

Full US Retail. ePub and Calibre Reader ready. Metadata is complete and up to date.
